content.rendered: The Office of Diversity and Inclusivity offers many opportunities for you to learn about issues related to diversity, inclusivity, and equity.  Through the course of the academic year, we host events such as town halls, panels, and trainings that address current local and national issues.  Our goal is to provide programming that is intersectional in nature, allowing you to explore and reflect upon your own identities, while at the same time develop a more inclusive, aware, and responsive community.
